title: Chalice Cover, 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk, silver and gold metalllic thread on silk
Technique: embroidered on taffeta; bobbin lace
creditline: Gift of Richard C. Greenleaf Esq. in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Square chalice cover of red taffeta embroidered in silver thread. The design shows symmetrical arrangement of corner designs of flower clusters (roses and carnations) and scrolling lines. In center "I.H.S." is in a circular frame of wheat and grapes. Edged with narrow gold bobbin lace.

tombstone.epitaph:
Chalice Cover, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: silk, silver and gold metalllic thread on silk
Technique: embroidered on taffeta; bobbin lace. Gift of Richard C. Greenleaf Esq. in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1950-121-62.
